object.name: EnergyUsage
object.desc: This object contains energy usage information for an energy location.

element.name: UsageLocationInfo
element.desc: Complex element containing the location of where measurements apply to.

element.name: DataSource
element.desc: The description of the source of the measurements.

element.name: SchoolId
element.desc: "e.g., urn:sif:school:AcmeMiddleSchool1.CoyoteDistrict.Arizona. e.g., urn:sif:school:AcmeMiddleSchool1.CoyoteDistrict.Arizona."

element.name: Building
element.desc: Name of the School Building.

element.name: EnergyZone
element.desc: Complex element refining and narrowing the location of the contained readings within the School/Building.

element.name: Type
element.desc: Complex type of the facility or location supported by the Energy Zone.

element.name: Facility
element.desc: Type of educational facility. Either the faciity type or the description must be provided.

element.name: Description
element.desc:
"Used when location type is not covered by prefixed values in enumerated facility type list.
Used when location type is not covered by prefixed values in enumerated facility type list."

element.name: EnergyZoneName
element.desc: Text description of Energy Zone Area to which readings will apply.

element.name: TagList
element.desc: List of energy zone identifiers (each consisting of a Name and Value).

element.name: Tag
element.desc: An energy zone identifier. Could include “SensorGroup”, or individual SensorId”, or anything else.

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name of the tag

element.name: Value
element.desc: Value of the tag

element.name: System
element.desc: Identifier of the reporting system.

element.name: StartTime
element.desc: Start time of measurements that follow.

element.name: ReadingDataList
element.desc: List of ReadingData

element.name: ReadingData
element.desc: Complex element defining a set of parameters that apply to all the actual readings that follow.

element.name: Measurement
element.desc: Measurement type

element.name: SensorId
element.desc: Identification of internal meter or data source.

element.name: Interval
element.desc: Time in seconds between Measurements.

element.name: EnergyUnits
element.desc: One of enumerated list of unit types for energy readings (temperature, electrical energy usage, gas usage and the price for both).

element.name: ReadingName
element.desc: Description of collection of readings

element.name: ReadingList
element.desc: Collection of reported data readings, in time order.

element.name: Reading
element.desc: Values for the energy readings for each interval.

attribute.name: IntervalIndex
attribute.desc: Interval number when reading was taken.
